sense.def:
Fear
je neprijeten občutek zaskrbljenosti, ki ga dobimo, kadar mislimo, da smo v nevarnosti ali da se bo zgodilo nekaj strašnega.

seg.quote: They huddled together, quaking with fear.
She was brought up with no fear of animals.

sense.def:
A fear
je misel, da se lahko zgodi ali se je morda zgodilo nekaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: My worst fears were quickly realized.

sense.def:
Če nečesa ne storimo
for fear of something happening
, tistega ne storimo, ker ne želimo, da bi se nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: They did not mention it for fear of offending him.

sense.def:
To fear someone or something
pomeni, da smo zaradi nekoga ali nečesa živčni ali zaskrbljeni;

To fear something unpleasant
pomeni biti zaskrbljen, da se je ali da se bo morda zgodilo nekaj neprijetnega;

seg.quote: An epidemic of plague was feared.
They fear that their new-found independence might be lost.

sense.def:
To fear for something
pomeni biti v skrbeh, da nečemu morda grozi nevarnost;

seg.quote: Morris began to fear for the life of Mrs Reilly.

sense.def:
To fear that something is the case
pomeni, da nam je žal ali smo žalostni, ker je nekaj tako, kot je;

seg.quote: It is usually, I fear, the parents who are responsible.
